scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path ./node_modules/normalize-scss/sass --include-path ./node_modules/jeet --source-map true --output-style compressed styles/scss -o styles && mv styles/main.css styles/main-min.css && mv styles/main.css.map styles/main-min.css.map
scripts.optimize-icons: svgo -f assets/icons -o assets/icons && rm -rf assets/icons/sprite.svg && svg-sprite-generate -d assets/icons -o assets/icons/sprite.svg
scripts.build-all: npm run build-css && npm run autoprefix-css && npm run build-js && npm run optimize-images && npm run optimize-icons
scripts.watch-scss: onchange 'styles/scss/*.scss' -- npm run build-css && npm run autoprefix-css
scripts.postinstall: parallelshell 'npm run watch-scss' 'npm run watch-js' 'npm run live-server'
scripts.start: parallelshell 'npm run watch-scss' 'npm run watch-js' 'npm run live-server'
